description.value:
You open your mind to the metaphysical, enabling you to sense nearby spirits. Even if you aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Search]{Searching}, you get a check to find haunts and spirits in the area. You gain a +1 status bonus to the following checks regarding haunts or spirits: Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek], attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge], skill checks to determine the reason for their existence, and skill checks to disable a haunt. You also gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws against haunts and spirits.

Heightened (6th) The spell's duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Spirit Sense]
